post:
Hello folks,

I have been prepared this offer to make it in Black Friday but due of overload in that day we will do this 1 month before so what we offer :

Storage kvm 1tb

1 core (E5-2450L cpu)
512 mb ram
1 tb Hdd (raid10)
5 tb traffic/mo
1 ipv4
1gbps port speed
Location : Romania/Norway

Our unbeliever price will be 35 eur/year or 50 eur/3years for any location

Link to buy in Norway (14 days delivery maximum ) : https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=475

link to buy in Romania (1-2 days for delivery) : https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=415

BUYER PLEASE NOTE :

in any location once the vps is provided we will change the next due date accordingly so you will not lost any day in invoice.

Once the service is delivered you have 5 days for money back guarantee no question but you need to not cross this lines :

1) do not abuse
2) do not cross 500gb traffic

This is a crazy price to celebrate our expansion so this offer will be difficult to find it more (at least until now we have offered it only one time here in LET and if i good remember was in a black friday .

This offer is limited to 200 vps for each location, once is out is out.

The Norway location will be Terrahost DC.

Any question regarding this services feel free to ask.
